Input: I would like YouTube to keep playing a video when I lock my screen
Because when I listen to a song now and I for example want to ride my bike I have to put my phone in my pocket
I would like to see the rating of videos by other YouTubers before clicking on a video
Because now I have to click the video to find out the rating of other people
I want YouTube to load videos while ads are playing
Because now I have to wait for the video to load after watching ads
I want a button so that I can make text on YouTube larger
Because I have trouble reading the text sometimes
I want a category with educational videos
Because I like watching those videos
